author: ralexstokes
content: this channel is created reflecting our upgrade incident response doc here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Fusaka/fusaka-mainnet-plan.md#communication-channels

author: ralexstokes
content: the main purpose is just to have a single high-signal async place we can use if needed

author: ralexstokes
content: e.g. check out <#1369340532828012684> for an example

author: ralexstokes
